item.title: Can This Code Work For Everyone On My Server?
item.dc:creator: @IAsk IAsk
item.description:
@IAsk wrote:

Hi i’m IAsk,
Can someone tell me if this code that refreshes the levels, will work for everyone on the server. If it wont, can someone tell me how to make it.

Thankyou.

public void updatestats(){ sendFrame126(""+playerLevel[0]+"", 4004); sendFrame126(""+playerLevel[1]+"", 4008); sendFrame126(""+playerLevel[2]+"", 4006); sendFrame126(""+playerLevel[4]+"", 4010); sendFrame126(""+playerLevel[6]+"", 4014); sendFrame126(""+playerLevel[7]+"", 4034); sendFrame126(""+playerLevel[8]+"", 4038); sendFrame126(""+playerLevel[9]+"", 4026); sendFrame126(""+playerLevel[10]+"", 4032); sendFrame126(""+playerLevel[11]+"", 4036); sendFrame126(""+playerLevel[12]+"", 4024); sendFrame126(""+playerLevel[13]+"", 4030); sendFrame126(""+playerLevel[14]+"", 4028); sendFrame126(""+playerLevel[15]+"", 4020); sendFrame126(""+playerLevel[16]+"", 4018); sendFrame126(""+playerLevel[17]+"", 4022); sendFrame126(""+playerLevel[20]+"", 4152); sendFrame126(""+playerLevel[5]+"", 4012); sendFrame126(""+getLevelForXP(playerXP[0])+"", 4005); sendFrame126(""+getLevelForXP(playerXP[2])+"", 4007); sendFrame126(""+getLevelForXP(playerXP[1])+"", 4009); sendFrame126(""+getLevelForXP(playerXP[4])+"", 4011); sendFrame126(""+getLevelForXP(playerXP[5])+"", 4013); sendFrame126(""+getLevelForXP(playerXP[6])+"", 4015); sendFrame126(""+getLevelForXP(playerXP[3])+"", 4017); sendFrame126(""+getLevelForXP(playerXP[16])+"", 4019); sendFrame126(""+getLevelForXP(playerXP[15])+"", 4021); sendFrame126(""+getLevelForXP(playerXP[17])+"", 4023); sendFrame126(""+getLevelForXP(playerXP[12])+"", 4025); sendFrame126(""+getLevelForXP(playerXP[9])+"", 4027); sendFrame126(""+getLevelForXP(playerXP[14])+"", 4029); sendFrame126(""+getLevelForXP(playerXP[13])+"", 4031); sendFrame126(""+getLevelForXP(playerXP[10])+"", 4033); sendFrame126(""+getLevelForXP(playerXP[7])+"", 4035); sendFrame126(""+getLevelForXP(playerXP[11])+"", 4037); sendFrame126(""+getLevelForXP(playerXP[8])+"", 4039); sendFrame126(""+getLevelForXP(playerXP[20])+"", 4153); sendFrame126(""+getLevelForXP(playerXP[18])+"", 12167); sendFrame126(""+getLevelForXP(playerXP[19])+"", 13927); }

Read full topic
